question: Question_01_(a)
statement:
Evaluate
$\int_0^1 \left( \sqrt{x^3} + \left(x^2\right)^{1/3}\right)\,dx.$
Simplify your answer as much as possible.
hints:
Convert the powers to fractions.

More correct way to say this: Write each of $\sqrt{x^3}$ and
$\left(x^2\right)^{1/3}$ as a power of $\displaystyle{ x }$ with a
fractional exponent.
